Class PlaylistNavigatorView

java.lang.Object
musicApp.views.View
musicApp.views.playlists.PlaylistNavigatorView
public class PlaylistNavigatorView extends View
The PlaylistNavigatorView class is responsible for displaying and managing the playlist navigator UI. It allows users to create, edit, and delete playlists, as well as manage their contents.

    PlaylistNavigatorView.PlaylistNavigatorViewListener

    • setListener

      public void setListener(PlaylistNavigatorView.PlaylistNavigatorViewListener newListener)
      Sets listener.
      Parameters:
      newListener - the listener

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the PlaylistNavigatorView. This method sets up the list view, button actions, and context menu for the view.
      Specified by:
      init in class View

    • initListView

      private void initListView()
      Initializes the list view for displaying playlists. This method sets the cell factory for the list view to use a custom PlaylistCell.

    • setButtonActions

      private void setButtonActions()
      Sets up the button actions for creating a new playlist. This method binds the button action to open a dialog for creating a new playlist.

    • refreshTranslation

      protected void refreshTranslation()
      Initializes the translation for the UI elements. This method binds the button text to the appropriate language string.
      Overrides:
      refreshTranslation in class View

    • update

      public void update(List<Library> libraries)
      Updates the list view with the provided list of libraries. This method clears the current items in the list view and adds the new libraries.
      Parameters:
      libraries - The list of libraries to display in the list view.

    • enableClickToSelect

      public void enableClickToSelect()
      Enable click to select playlists.
